title: The Most Comfortable Platform Sneakers to Elevate Your Style This Season

html:
Suede Sensation

Adidas Gazelle Bold

Pros

  • Trendy
  • Lots of color options
  • Available on Amazon Prime

Cons

    It’s no surprise that Adidas has found its way into another list of the best sneakers. Foot support fuses with style and the brand’s iconic three stripes to create a platformed classic.

    Sizes: 5-11

    Colors: 18 options

    Material: Suede, rubber

    Customer review: “An absolute dream to wear! They were comfortable from the moment I put them on.”

    Sustainable Brand

    Veja Campo Sneaker

    Pros

    • Versatile styling
    • Sustainable

    Since its inception in 2005, Veja has continued to explore sustainable and transparent production techniques. Made in high-standard factories in Brazil and Portugal, your conscience can carry on guilt-free in these.

    Sizes: 35-42.5

    Colors: 25 options

    Material: Leather, rubber

    Customer review: “These are super stylish with a minimalist look, which I love. Very comfortable for walking. These look great with all the outfits I’ve paired them with.”

    Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

    Editor’s Choice

    Reebok Club C Extra Sneaker

    Pros

    • Editor-loved
    • Under $100

    Cons

    • Difficult to dress up

    ELLE’s associate fashion commerce editor, Meg Donohue, says these are her current go-to. With hundreds of positive reviews affirming stability and support, it’s safe to say that Reebok (and Meg) cracked the code to comfortability.

    Colors: Chalk/Glen Green, Chalk/Hoop Red, White, White/Hazy Grey, White/Vector Blue

    Sizes: 5-11

    Material: Rubber

    Customer review: “Comfy. Fits with almost every outfıt.”

    Retro Look

    Gola Grandslam Elite

    Cons

      What goes around comes around, and the retro sneaker trend is a perfect example. Gola brought back this timeless style affordably, comfortably, and with colorways that are sure to strike your fancy.

      Sizes: 5-11

      Colors: White/Hot Fuschia

      Material: Rubber

      Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

      Mixed Materials

      Chloé Nama Platform Sneaker

      Pros

      • Editor-loved
      • Recycled materials
      • Designer

      Cons

        These mixed material sneakers from Chloé are the perfect way to add texture to your wardrobe. Plus, Claire Stern Milch, ELLE’s digital director, loves them.

        Sizes: 5-11

        Colors: 8 options

        Material: Recycled polyester, yarn

        Customer review: “I spent two weeks in Europe and wore these shoes every single day. Walked miles and up stairs all day and never got foot pains. If you’re debating whether to get these shoes…get them. I NEVER write reviews, but I had to get on here and preach about these shoes!”

        Canvas Option

        Gucci Chunky Sneaker

        Cons

          Gucci knows how to make a shoe. We love the subtlety of the brand’s monogram and how it can be dressed up or down. Another great designer choice!

          Sizes: 5.5-11.5

          Colors: Black, Ancora Rosso, White

          Material: Canvas, rubber

          Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

          Hybrid Pick

          Nike Waffle Debut Vintage

          Pros

          • Under $100
          • Traction sole

          Cons

            Would it be a sneaker roundup without a pair of Nikes? This retro style is reimagined with a modern, sleek aesthetic and made of a waffle fabric your feet will love.

            Sizes: 5-12

            Colors: 7 options

            Materials: Leather, textile, rubber

            Customer review: “These are so well padded and comfortable! So glad I finally purchased! Feels like I’m walking on clouds!”

            White Leather

            Puma Karmen II Idol Sneaker

            Pros

            • Under $100
            • Available on Amazon Prime

            Cons

              An all-white sneaker is a closet necessity, and Puma’s Karmen II Idol fits the bill. Made comfortable with a special SoftFoam+ sock liner, you can wear these all day long.

              Sizes: 5.5-11

              Colors: 9 options

              Material: Leather, rubber

              Customer review: “Comfortable to wear all day. These have become my go-to shoes for work because they look awesome and make any outfit fun. Definitely recommend.”

              Court Shoe

              Tory Burch Clover Court Platform Sneaker

              Pros

              • Stylish colorways
              • Designer
              • Free shipping and returns

              Cons

                Tory Burch’s love for sport and luxury is no secret, and neither is her ability to create elevated athleisure. These trainers are designed for comfort and traction while maintaining the design integrity Burch is known for.

                Sizes: 5-12

                Colors: Pink Primrose, White/Silver/Feather Grey, New Ivory/Cerbiatto

                Materials: Leather

                Customer review: “Love my new sneakers. They are so comfortable and easy to pair with different outfits.”

                Runway Pick

                Prada Laced Fabric Sneakers

                Cons

                  Prada proves made for more than just the runway with these street style sneakers. Subtly embossed with the house’s signature triangle logo, these shoes are total quiet luxury.

                  Sizes: 34.5-41.5

                  Colors: Cord, White, Black

                  Materials: Cotton, rubber

                  Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

                  Easy Slip-On

                  Vans Classic Slip-On Stackform

                  Pros

                  • Easy on-and-off
                  • Under $100
                  • Available on Amazon Prime

                  Cons

                  • Difficult to dress up

                  Perhaps one of the most recognizable pieces of footwear, the checkered Vans have remained consistent since the mid ’70s. The iconic shoes’ comfortability and slip-on style has long been a favorite of senior fashion commerce editor Dale Arden Chong, and now the classic skating shoe reaches new heights with a platform bottom.

                  Sizes: 5-12.5

                  Colors: Checkerboard Black/White, Marshmallow/Turtledove, True White

                  Materials: Canvas, rubber

                  Metallic Accent

                  Golden Goose Hi Star Platform Sneaker

                  Here’s the luxury sneaker that seemed to take the world by storm, and rightfully so. We love the thick sole on these. Plus, they can be easily dressed up or down.

                  Sizes: 5-12

                  Materials: Leather, suede

                  Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

                  Meet The Expert

                  • Jordan Leib is the assistant fashion director at Bloomingdale’s.

                  Why Trust ELLE
